H0.text: Which golf shot is the opposite of a slice. Draw

H1.text: Which golf shot is the opposite of a slice. Fade

H2.text: Which golf shot is the opposite of a slice. Push

H3.text: Which golf shot is the opposite of a slice. Hook

A4.text: A hook occurs when the clubface is closed relative to the swingpath or with an inside‑out swingpath and thus flies severely from right to left for a right‑handed player, or vice versa for a left‑handed player.

A5.text: A draw is a stroke played with the effect that, for a right‑handed player, the ball moves from right to left during flight. Conversely the ball will move from left to right for a left‑handed player.
